member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.NuGet.RepositorySettings.GetConfigurationPath(JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath)
member.summary: Returns the configuraton path by walking the directory structure to find a nuget.config file.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.NuGet.RepositorySettings.GetRepositoryPathFromConfig(JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath)
member.summary: Extracts the repository path from a nuget.config settings file
member.param: Full path to the nuget.config file

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.NuGet.RepositorySettings.GetConfigurationFiles(JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath)
member.summary: Returns the list of candidates for nuget config files.
